text:
A few documentation patches expanding some of the documentation, e.g. adding 
basic documentation for the remaining functions.

Also an update to site_printable.vsl which allows the index to be generated 
without second-level (sub-section) entries, and an option to split the index 
into two columns, based on matching the start of the section name. The 
intention is to make the page more compact.

One thing I noticed is that the printable pages are still a bit wide for 
printing (and probably also for Help). I think this is mainly due to a few 
large images, and one or two pre-formatted text sections that have rather long 
lines. I've fixed some of the longer lines, but not (yet) the images.
creator: tjsb@slb.com

text:
Created attachment 6772
site_print.patch - updates to site_printable.vsl
creator: tjsb@slb.com
tjsb@slb.com
text:
Created attachment 6773
docs.patch - patches to usermanual documents

Can we now move the user_manual directories to the attic? 

The contents are all out of date, as far as I can see, and it could be 
confusing to leave them in for the next JMeter release.

[I don't know how to create a patch to do this!]
creator: tjsb@slb.com
